text: 16.18 Plp 3.19, Kol 2.4, 1 Ti 6.5, Tat 1.10, 2 Pi 2.3 Bɨ anɨgɨpal okok, Bɨawl chɨn Klays nop wog ak ma gɨpal. Mubwak kɨli ke anep gos nɨŋɨd gɨpal. Kɨli chɨn binɨb okok kɨlop takaw yepɨs agɨl, tɨtay dɨl dɨnɨgun agɨl, takaw yɨdek apal. Takaw anɨb ak agel, binɨb gos kɨli pal awl ma mɨdeb okok, kɨli kɨlop nepal. Nɨŋɨd, takaw nɨŋɨd yɨbɨl agebal agɨl, yepɨs adek apal ak kɨdek gɨpal.
